jumbotron.conference: XI Latin American Conference on Human Computer Interaction

about.about_text: The Latin American Conference on Human-Computer Interaction (CLIHC) is managed by the SIGCHI Latin American HCI Community (LAIHC). CLIHC is a premier conference that brings together the Latin American and international HCI research communities to discuss and exchange ideas, methods, approaches, and techniques for designing interactive user experiences and encourages intercultural exchange and cooperation between people with different backgrounds and needs. This conference has its origin in Rio de Janeiro 2003 (Brazil), following editions in Cuernavaca 2005 (Mexico), Rio de Janeiro 2007 (Brazil), Merida 2009 (Mexico), Porto de Galinhas 2011 (Brazil), Guanacaste 2013 (Costa Rica), Córdoba 2015 (Argentina), Antigua 2017 (Guatemala), and Panama City 2019 (Panama) and Virtual Conference 2021 (Online).

organizers.title: Organizers
organizers.intro: The primary objective of the 2023 Latin American Conference on Human-Computer Interaction (CLIHC) is to foster collaboration, discussion, and knowledge exchange among international and Latin American HCI researchers. The conference aims to promote human-centered and culturally aware artificial intelligence design and development, and provide a platform for the presentation and discussion of new ideas, methods, and techniques for designing interactive user experiences. The conference will be held in Puebla, Mexico, and is organized by a diverse group of experts from Latin America and beyond.
organizers.conference_chairs_description: Leading the organization and coordination of the conference program and activities.
organizers.local_chairs_description: Responsible for overseeing local arrangements and logistics for the conference.
organizers.program_chairs_description: Responsible for the conference program and paper selection process.
organizers.student_design_competition_description: In charge of organizing the Student Design Competition.
organizers.graduate_colloquium_chairs_description: Oversees the organization of the graduate colloquium track.
organizers.workshops_and_tutorials_chairs_descripti: Responsible for coordinating and overseeing the workshops and tutorials sessions.
organizers.posters_chairs_description: Responsible for overseeing all aspects related to the poster session.
organizers.publicity_chair_description: In charge of managing and promoting the conference's publicity and outreach efforts.
organizers.web_chairs_description: Responsible for the design, development, and maintenance of the conference website.
organizers.volunteer_students_chair_description: In charge of managing and coordinating volunteer students for the conference.
organizers.acccessibility_chairs_description: Responsible for overseeing comprehensive accessibility measures during the conference.

home.keynotes_message: The conference program includes great speakers from the international HCI community.
